          <title>
            <string language="hu">Jacob van Ruisdael: Tengeri vihar. Kimbell Art Museum. 98,1 x 132 cm. Olaj, fatábla.</string>
            <string language="en">Jacob van Ruisdael: Seascape with a Storm, Kimbell Art Museum. 98,1 x 132 cm. Oil, wooden plate.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jacob van Ruisdael: Meerblick mit einem
Sturm, Kimbell kunst-Museum. 98.1 x 132 Zentimeter. Öl, 
hölzerne Platte.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jacob van Ruisdael : Paysage marin avec un 
Donner l'assaut à, musée d'art de Kimbell. 98.1 x 132 centimètres. 
Huile, plat en bois.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jacob camionete Ruisdael: Seascape com uma 
tempestade, museu da arte de Kimbell. 98.1 x 132 cm. 
Óleo, placa de madeira.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Jacob van Ruisdael: Seascape con una 
tempesta, museo di arte di Kimbell. 98.1 x 132 centimetri. 
Olio, piastra di legno.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Jacob βαν Ruisdael: Seascape με μια 
θύελλα, μουσείο τέχνης Kimbell. 98.1 X 132 
εκατ.. Πετρέλαιο, ξύλινο πιάτο.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Jacob van Ruisdael: Paisaje marino con una 
tormenta, museo del arte de Kimbell. 98.1 x 132 centímetros. 
Aceite, placa de madera.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Viharos tengeren hánykolódó hajók</string>
            <string language="en">Tossing ships on a rough sea</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">17. század,   festészet,   tájkép,   Hollandia,   Riusdael,  </string>
            <string language="en">17th century, painting, landscape, the Netherlands, Riusdael</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Werfen der Schiffe auf einem rauhen Meer</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lancement en l'air des bateaux sur une mer agitée</string>
          </description>
          <description>
